title: DeathDate
description: A YA Supernatural/Thriller novella coming December 2013 for Kindle!What would you do if you knew how and when you would die?There's a couple of odd things about Nessa : thanks to her grandfather dabbling in things in Science that shouldn't be dabbled in, from the moment she turns sixteen she knows how and when she will die.The second odd thing about her is the reason Oliver, an assassin whose been assassinating dangerous people for a while, has her as his next target.
author: Fallon Trunko
